SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices

Klasse FleventsAccountControllerService

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices.FleventsAccountControllerService
@Service public class FleventsAccountControllerService extends Object
This Class is the service for the FleventsAccountController class. It provides methods regarding accounts. The methods of the FleventsAccountController are mapped on them.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

      public FleventsAccount getAccountById(String accountId)

      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get the account information from
      Gibt zurück:

    • getBookedEvents

      public List<Event> getBookedEvents(String accountId)
      Returns the booked events from a specified account.
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get the booked events from
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the booked events of the given account

    • getManagedEvents

      public List<Event> getManagedEvents(String accountId)
      Returns the managed events from the specified account, also containing all events from the organizations where the account is registered as admin.
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get the managed events from
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the managed events of the given account

    • getExploreEvents

      public List<Event> getExploreEvents(String accountId)
      Returns a list of events to explore for the specified account.
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account to get a list of events to explore for
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with events to explore for the specified account

    • getManagedOrganization

      public List<Organization> getManagedOrganization(String accountId)
      Get organizations where the given account has the role "administrator".
      Parameter:
      accountId - the id of the account
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the organizations where the account is administrator
